q: '' Kirsten Gillibrand also is continuing Lee's efforts towards helping the victims of Flight 3407. Lee pushed for tougher flight safety legislation after the crash and Kirsten Gillibrand said she will continue to do so. We wan na make sure that as we negotiate this FAA reauthorization that all the protections that those families lobbied for stay in place, said Kirsten Gillibrand . As for honoring a convicted felon, Dwaine Caraway said, ''I care deeply about animals'' and ''am deeply sorry to offend anyone who loves animals.'' He acknowledged Michael Vick 's past but noted that since making some bad choices, Michael Vick has devoted time to speaking to children about staying in school staying away from drugs, making positive choices about picking friends and the importance of education. That was the focus of the event. Mayor Tom Leppert said he has asked the city manager to ''propose guidelines to prevent this situation in the future. With Simon Cowell , and Paula Abdul , and Kara DioGuardi , and Ellen DeGeneres all gone, it's left to ''Idol's'' only surviving judge Randy Jackson to deliver the the talent is most definitely better than ever gag that traditionally kicks off the Hollywood elimination rounds. Double the contestants, double the drama, says Seabiscuit. Double the talent, he adds- not realizing Randy already covered that base.

The company said Page would take over from 4 April when Eric Schmidt will become executive chairman, ''focusing externally on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships''. Yet you have to be humble enough to recognize when you've made a mistake. I think I had the confidence part pretty solid. But the humbleness part I had to learn.
